sentences.en: ...a new kind of manufactured wood made by pressing strips of wood together and baking them.
sentences.cn: …一种通过把木条挤压并烘干而制成的新型人造木材。

sentences.en: a strip of sand between the cliffs and the sea
sentences.cn: 悬崖和大海之间的一块狭长沙地

sentences.en: In five years I had to strip the water pump down four times.
sentences.cn: 5年来我不得不将水泵拆开了4次。

sentences.en: Make a Mobius strip out of a ribbon of mild steel and magnetise it.
sentences.cn: 用一根软钢条做成麦比乌斯带，将其磁化。

sentences.en: Other causes of migraine are VDU screens and strip-lighting.
sentences.cn: 偏头痛的其他诱因还有电脑的视频显示器和灯管照明。

sentences.en: Sensitive Cream will not strip away the skin's protective layer.
sentences.cn: 敏感肌肤专用面霜不会破坏皮肤表面的保护层。

sentences.en: She banded the birthday gift with a silk strip.
sentences.cn: 她用一根丝带扎好了生日礼物.

sentences.en: She'd managed to strip the bloodied rags away from Nellie's body.
sentences.cn: 她已经设法将内利身上沾满血污的破烂衣衫脱掉了。

sentences.en: Strip the beds and wash the sheets.
Strip the children down ; get them out of those wet clothes.
sentences.cn: 把孩子们的那些湿衣服 脱光.

sentences.en: The aircraft circled round [ around ] over the landing strip.
sentences.cn: 飞机在着陆跑道上空 兜圈子.

sentences.en: The bent strip can straighten up by itself.
sentences.cn: 这弯曲的金属片自己可以变直.

sentences.en: The doctor told me to strip down to my shorts.
sentences.cn: 医生让我脱得只剩一条短裤.

sentences.en: The violence in the Gaza Strip makes the front page of most of the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 加沙地带的暴力事件成为大多数报纸的头版新闻。

sentences.en: The yacht is built of cedar strip planking.
sentences.cn: 游艇是用雪松木条建造的。

sentences.en: Varndell made his own reflector for these shots from a strip of humble kitchen foil.
sentences.cn: 瓦恩德尔用一狭条普通的厨房用箔纸自制了反光板来拍摄这些照片。

words.tran_cn: 拆开；去膜；加条纹；条纹图案
脱衣舞女；剥离器；脱模机
剥夺（strip的过去分词形式）；脱衣；把…剪成条状

phrases.tran_cn: 扁钢热轧机；带钢热轧机
带钢轧机；带材轧机；钢带轧机；板条辊轧机

trans.tran_cn: （纸、布、食物等的）条，带，狭长区域，商业街，队服，脱衣舞，连环画
脱衣服，除去，剥去，拆卸，剥夺
trans.tran_en: to remove something that is covering the surface of something else
to remove something that is covering the surface of something else
to remove something that is covering the surface of something else
